snippet: Until Kim Jong-un's wife, Ri Sol-ju, began appearing with him in public, there had seldom been a woman's face among the North's power circles filled with Mao-suited party secretaries and military generals in olive-colored uniforms.
abstract: Until Kim Jong-un's wife, Ri Sol-ju, began appearing with him in public, there had seldom been a woman's face among the North's power circles filled with Mao-suited party secretaries and military generals in olive-colored uniforms.

headline.main: In North Korea, Putting a Female Face Front and Center
